p: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
q: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
w: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
e: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
r: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
